description:
As a distinguished government-supported institution established under the BIUST Act (CAP 57:05), BIUST stands as a beacon of excellence in higher education. Our focus is  to nurture the brightest minds in Science, Engineering, and Technology at both the undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

With an unwavering commitment to quality, we're not just an institution - we're a community of innovators. Our vision is to become a globally renowned, entrepreneurial research-based university, consistently propelling  the boundaries of innovation and knowledge.

 Join us  in our journey to shape the future of science, engineering, and technology. Let's connect and collaborate for a brighter, more innovative world.

🚀 BIUST Hackathon: Innovate, Collaborate, Create! 
 
Are you passionate about data science and space research? Put your Python programming skills to the test in an exciting 4-day hackathon focused on CubeSat data optimisation!
 
💡 What: A transformative hackathon fostering innovation and collaboration in machine learning solutions for CubeSat data.
📅 When: February 17–20, 2025
📍 Where: BIUST Campus, Palapye

More information and applications: https://lnkd.in/dEGM7B-8

#Hackathon2025 #CubeSatInnovation #DataScience #PythonSkills #SpaceResearch

New Appointment at BIUST!
 
Join us in welcoming Dr. Kabo Poloko Nkabiti, a distinguished expert in Information and Communication Engineering, to our academic community! 
 
Dr. Nkabiti holds a BSc (Honours) in Computing from the Open University UK, an MSc in Information Systems from BIUST, and a PhD in Information and Communication Engineering from the University of Science and Technology Beijing. Currently serving as a Lecturer at Botswana International University of Science and Technology (BIUST), Dr. Nkabiti has also shared his expertise with Botho University and Botswana Accountancy College.
 
#WelcomeToBIUST#NewAppointment#STEMExcellence#Innovation #AcademicExcellence

📢 New Appointment at BIUST!

 
We are thrilled to welcome Dr. Rodnie Kgalemelo Mafa to the Botswana International University of Science & Technology (BIUST) as a lecturer in the Department of Computing and Informatics! 

 
Join us in welcoming Dr. Mafa to the BIUST community as he brings his passion for teaching and commitment to advancing computer science education to our students!
